response.overview: Spawn has Superianna, but he hasn't been able to break her mentally. He hooks her up to a machine he's created that will force Superianna into a dream state where each of her greatest fears will be played out. Spawn has allowed himself to accompany Superianna on her journey for some "encouragement". Superianna experiences 5 scenarios. The first, she finds herself powerless. The second, she finds herself frozen in place and unable to defend herself. Next, she finds herself strapped to a table and forced to cum with a device. Finally, she finds herself in a scenario where she has no pain tolerance. After living through these horrifying scenarios, she thinks she's awakened and it was all a dream. She quickly discovers Spawn at the end of her bed and she realizes this is yet another scenario, the worst scenario yet. Find out if she survives her greatest fears.
response.title: Fear
